children.text:
Over the 15 years you have been at Guildford we have shared many hours of you endlessly giving of yourself to solve my IT problems both at home and in the medical centre. 
I have been so privileged to be on the receiving end of your endless patience and your gentle approach to my often tedious requests. I know I would often ring asking to speak to you, knowing your kindness and genuine ability to make me feel heard with my lack of IT literacy.

node.name: Anne-Marie Wytkin
node.company: Guildford Grammar School - Curriculum and Data Officer

children.text:
You have been a wonderful support over the years, I could always rely on you to have the answers to any problem that arose. You are a kind and caring person and a fantastic supportive work colleague. 
I have worked with many people who work in a support roll over the years and you are one of the best. You are patient, kind and non judgmental in your approach to staff.

node.name: Kassandra Conway
node.company: Guildford Grammar School - Personal Assistant to the Head of Senior School

children.text:
It has been an absolute pleasure working with you. You were always so welcoming and kind to me and nothing was ever too much of a problem.
You were patient and always tried your best to fix the problem and get the best outcome for everyone, which is rare.
